title: Azir Soldier Auto Attack Bug
body:
I've noticed this problem about a month ago, when i was trying to improve some of my Azir skills.

Sometimes when you place a Soldier whith Azir and try to attack an enemy, after you casted your W/Q or in random moments when the Soldier already attacked, Azir will do his Auto Attack animation but the Soldier won't even move, i've only noticed this problem while using one Soldier and not multiple of them.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} It is VERY annoying to be in lane and place a soldier to farm some minions or attack the enemy and then you are not able to move because of the Auto  Attack animation but the Soldier does literally nothing, it's not a bug where the animation is just missing, it's also the damage.I lost alot of farm, kills and lanes because of this bug and it just makes playing Azir ALOT less fun, it happens about 5-6 times every game to me and every single time i say to myself that i should tell riot about it but i never knew how....

So im asking you, dear riot employees{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} .....Do you already know about this bug, are you already planning to fix it and if that's not the case then could you please try to fix it, that would make me ALOT happier!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
